snippet: Reconstituted rock bands like Black Sabbath, Afghan Whigs and At the Drive-In are on the 2012 Lollapalooza bill, along with more than 100 acts including Red Hot Chili Peppers, the Black Keys, the Shins, Florence + the Machine, Jack White, Passion...
abstract: Reconstituted rock bands like Black Sabbath, Afghan Whigs and At the Drive-In are on the 2012 Lollapalooza bill, along with more than 100 acts including Red Hot Chili Peppers, the Black Keys, the Shins, Florence + the Machine, Jack White, Passion Pit, Sigur Ros, J. Cole and Frank Ocean.

headline.main: Reunited and It Feels So Good: Lollapalooza 2012 Lineup Unveiled
